Template Function ccn_act_hande¶

  • Defined in File user_functions.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
void ccn_act_hande(float_t &p_prime, float_t &w_prime, float_t &T_prime, float_t &qv_prime, float_t &qc_prime, float_t &Nc, const double &EPSILON, std::vector<float_t> &res, model_constants_t &cc)¶

CCN activation after Hande et al 2015.

p_prime Pressure [Pa] w_prime Ascend velocity [m s^-1] T_prime Temperature [K] qv_prime Water vapor mixing ratio qc_prime Cloud water mixing ratio Nc Number of cloud droplets EPSILON Small value that qc needs to exceed res Vector to store the changes cc Model constants
